#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{

ll i,t,n,a[100000],maxm,sum;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
cin>>n;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
cin>>a[i];
maxm=0;sum=0;
for(i=1;i<n;i++)
{
if(a[i]==a[i-1])sum++;
else
{
maxm=max(maxm,sum);
sum=0;
}
}
cout<<max(maxm,sum)<<"\n";
}return 0;
}
